verses.verse: "Give <S%H238><s%> ear, <S%H238><s%> O heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and let me speak; <S%H1696><s%> And let the earth <S%H776><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

"Let my teaching <S%H3948><s%> drop <S%H6201><s%> as the rain, <S%H4306><s%> My speech <S%H565><s%> distill <S%H5140><s%> as the dew, <S%H2919><s%> As the droplets <S%H8164><s%> on the fresh <S%H1877><s%> grass <S%H1877><s%> And as the showers <S%H7241><s%> on the herb. <S%H6212><s%>
"For I proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> greatness <S%H1433><s%> to our God! <S%H430><s%>

"The Rock! <S%H6697><s%> His work <S%H6467><s%> is perfect, <S%H8549><s%> For all <S%H3605><s%> His ways <S%H1870><s%> are just; <S%H4941><s%> A God <S%H410><s%> of faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> injustice, <S%H5766><s%> Righteous <S%H6662><s%> and upright <S%H3477><s%> is He.

"They have acted <S%H7843><s%> corruptly <S%H7843><s%> toward Him, [They are] not His children, <S%H1121><s%> because of their defect; <S%H9249><s%> [But are] a perverse <S%H6141><s%> and crooked <S%H6618><s%> generation.

"Do you thus <S%H2088><s%> repay <S%H1580><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O foolish <S%H5036><s%> and unwise <S%H3808><s%> <S%H2450><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>? Is not He your Father who has bought <S%H1><s%> you? He has made <S%H7069><s%> you and established <S%H6213><s%> you.

"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> Consider <S%H995><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> your father, and he will inform <S%H1><s%> you, Your elders, <S%H5046><s%> and they will tell <S%H2205><s%> you.

"When the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> gave <S%H5157><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5157><s%> When He separated <S%H6504><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> He set <S%H5324><s%> the boundaries <S%H1367><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> According to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
"For the Lord's portion <S%H2506><s%> is His people; <S%H5971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is the allotment <S%H9112><s%> of His inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

"He found <S%H4672><s%> him in a desert <S%H4057><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> And in the howling <S%H3214><s%> waste <S%H8414><s%> of a wilderness; <S%H3452><s%> He encircled <S%H5437><s%> him, He cared <S%H995><s%> for him, He guarded <S%H5431><s%> him as the pupil <S%H380><s%> of His eye. <S%H5869><s%>

"Like an eagle <S%H5404><s%> that stirs <S%H5782><s%> up its nest, <S%H7064><s%> That hovers <S%H9550><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> its young, <S%H1469><s%> He spread <S%H6566><s%> His wings <S%H3671><s%> and caught <S%H3947><s%> them, He carried <S%H5375><s%> them on His pinions. <S%H84><s%>
"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> guided <S%H5148><s%> him, And there <S%H369><s%> was no <S%H369><s%> foreign <S%H5236><s%> god <S%H410><s%> with him.

"He made him ride <S%H7392><s%> on the high <S%H1116><s%> places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> And he ate <S%H398><s%> the produce <S%H8570><s%> of the field; <S%H9583><s%> And He made him suck <S%H3243><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> from the rock, <S%H5553><s%> And oil <S%H8081><s%> from the flinty <S%H2496><s%> rock, <S%H6697><s%>

Curds <S%H2529><s%> of cows, <S%H1241><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> With fat <S%H2459><s%> of lambs, <S%H3733><s%> And rams, <S%H352><s%> the breed <S%H1121><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and goats, <S%H6260><s%> With the finest <S%H2459><s%> <S%H3629><s%> of the wheat <S%H2406><s%> – And of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%> you drank <S%H8354><s%> wine. <S%H2561><s%>

"But Jeshurun <S%H3484><s%> grew <S%H8080><s%> fat <S%H8080><s%> and kicked <S%H1163><s%> – You are grown <S%H8080><s%> fat, <S%H8080><s%> thick, <S%H5666><s%> and sleek <S%H3780><s%> – Then he forsook <S%H5203><s%> God <S%H433><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> him, And scorned <S%H9310><s%> the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of his salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
"They made <S%H7065><s%> Him jealous <S%H7065><s%> with strange <S%H2114><s%> [gods;] With abominations <S%H8441><s%> they provoked <S%H3707><s%> Him to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

"They sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to demons <S%H7700><s%> who were not God, <S%H433><s%> To gods <S%H430><s%> whom they have not known, <S%H3045><s%> New <S%H2319><s%> [gods] who came <S%H935><s%> lately, <S%H7138><s%> Whom your fathers did not dread. <S%H1><s%>
"You neglected <S%H7876><s%> the Rock <S%H6697><s%> who begot <S%H3205><s%> you, And forgot <S%H7911><s%> the God <S%H410><s%> who gave <S%H9123><s%> you birth. <S%H9123><s%>
"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [this,] and spurned <S%H5006><s%> [them] Because <S%H4480><s%> of the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of His sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

"Then He said, <S%H559><s%> 'I will hide <S%H5641><s%> My face <S%H6440><s%> from them, I will see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> their end <S%H319><s%> [shall be;] For they are a perverse <S%H8419><s%> generation, Sons <S%H1121><s%> in whom is no <S%H3808><s%> faithfulness. <S%H529><s%>

'They have made <S%H7065><s%> Me jealous <S%H7065><s%> with [what] is not God; <S%H410><s%> They have provoked <S%H3707><s%> Me to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their idols. <S%H1892><s%> So I will make them jealous <S%H7065><s%> with [those who] are not a people; <S%H5971><s%> I will provoke <S%H3707><s%> them to anger <S%H3707><s%> with a foolish <S%H5036><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%>

For a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in My anger, <S%H639><s%> And burns <S%H3344><s%> to the lowest <S%H8482><s%> part <S%H8482><s%> of Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> And consumes <S%H398><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with its yield, <S%H2981><s%> And sets <S%H3857><s%> on fire <S%H3857><s%> the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
'I will heap <S%H5595><s%> misfortunes <S%H9567><s%> on them; I will use <S%H3615><s%> My arrows <S%H2671><s%> on them.

'[They shall be] wasted <S%H4198><s%> by famine, <S%H7458><s%> and consumed <S%H9237><s%> by plague <S%H7565><s%> And bitter <S%H4815><s%> destruction; <S%H6986><s%> And the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of beasts <S%H929><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> upon them, With the venom <S%H2534><s%> of crawling <S%H9102><s%> things <S%H9102><s%> of the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

'Outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall bereave, <S%H7921><s%> And inside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2315><s%> terror <S%H367><s%> – Both <S%H1571><s%> young <S%H970><s%> man <S%H970><s%> and virgin, <S%H1330><s%> The nursling <S%H3243><s%> with the man <S%H376><s%> of gray <S%H7872><s%> hair. <S%H7872><s%>
'I would have said, <S%H559><s%> "I will cut <S%H6284><s%> them to pieces, <S%H6284><s%> I will remove <S%H7673><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of them from men, <S%H582><s%>"

Had I not feared <S%H9076><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> by the enemy, <S%H340><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> their adversaries <S%H6862><s%> should misjudge, <S%H9330><s%> Lest <S%H6435><s%> they should say, <S%H559><s%> "Our hand <S%H3027><s%> is triumphant, <S%H7311><s%> And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not done <S%H6466><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this. <S%H2088><s%>"'
"For they are a nation <S%H1471><s%> lacking in counsel, <S%H6><s%> And there <S%H6098><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> understanding <S%H369><s%> in them.
"Would <S%H3863><s%> that they were wise, <S%H2449><s%> that they understood <S%H7919><s%> this, <S%H2088><s%> That they would discern <S%H995><s%> their future! <S%H319><s%>

"How <S%H351><s%> could one <S%H259><s%> chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> And two <S%H8147><s%> put <S%H5127><s%> ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> to flight, <S%H5127><s%> Unless <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3588><s%> their Rock <S%H6697><s%> had sold <S%H4376><s%> them, And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had given <S%H5462><s%> them up?
"Indeed <S%H3588><s%> their rock <S%H6697><s%> is not like our Rock, <S%H6697><s%> Even our enemies <S%H340><s%> themselves judge <S%H6414><s%> this.

"For their vine <S%H1612><s%> is from the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> And from the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Gomorrah; <S%H6017><s%> Their grapes <S%H6025><s%> are grapes <S%H6025><s%> of poison, <S%H7219><s%> Their clusters, <S%H811><s%> bitter. <S%H4846><s%>
"Their wine <S%H3196><s%> is the venom <S%H2534><s%> of serpents, <S%H8577><s%> And the deadly <S%H393><s%> poison <S%H7219><s%> of cobras. <S%H6620><s%>
'Is it not laid <S%H3647><s%> up in store <S%H3647><s%> with Me, Sealed <S%H2856><s%> up in My treasuries <S%H214><s%>?

'Vengeance <S%H5359><s%> is Mine, and retribution, <S%H8005><s%> In due time <S%H6256><s%> their foot <S%H7272><s%> will slip; <S%H4131><s%> For the day <S%H3117><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%> And the impending <S%H6264><s%> things <S%H6264><s%> are hastening <S%H2363><s%> upon them.'

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will vindicate <S%H1777><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%> And will have <S%H5162><s%> compassion <S%H5162><s%> on His servants; <S%H5650><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> He sees <S%H7200><s%> that [their] strength <S%H3027><s%> is gone, <S%H235><s%> And there <S%H657><s%> is none <S%H657><s%> [remaining,] bond <S%H6113><s%> or free. <S%H5800><s%>
"And He will say, <S%H559><s%> 'Where <S%H335><s%> are their gods, <S%H430><s%> The rock <S%H6697><s%> in which they sought <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%>?

'Who <S%H834><s%> ate <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> [And] drank <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of their libation <S%H9331><s%>? Let them rise <S%H6965><s%> up and help <S%H5826><s%> you, Let them be your hiding <S%H9377><s%> place! <S%H9377><s%>

'See <S%H7200><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> that I, I am He, And there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> god <S%H430><s%> besides <S%H5973><s%> Me; It is I who put <S%H4191><s%> to death <S%H4191><s%> and give <S%H2421><s%> life. <S%H2421><s%> I have wounded, <S%H4272><s%> and it is I who heal; <S%H7495><s%> And there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> one <S%H369><s%> who can deliver <S%H5337><s%> from My hand. <S%H3027><s%>
'Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> I lift <S%H5375><s%> up My hand <S%H3027><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> And say, <S%H559><s%> as I live <S%H2416><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%>

If <S%H518><s%> I sharpen <S%H8150><s%> My flashing <S%H1300><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> And My hand <S%H3027><s%> takes <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> on justice, <S%H4941><s%> I will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> on My adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And I will repay <S%H9608><s%> those who hate <S%H8130><s%> Me.

'I will make My arrows <S%H2671><s%> drunk <S%H7937><s%> with blood, <S%H1818><s%> And My sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> With the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> and the captives, <S%H7633><s%> From the long-haired leaders <S%H7218><s%> of the enemy. <S%H340><s%>'

"Rejoice, <S%H7442><s%> O nations, <S%H1471><s%> [with] His people; <S%H5971><s%> For He will avenge <S%H5358><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of His servants, <S%H5650><s%> And will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> on His adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And will atone <S%H3722><s%> for His land <S%H127><s%> [and] His people. <S%H5971><s%>"

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> song <S%H9598><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> he, with Joshua <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
When Moses <S%H4872><s%> had finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%>

he said <S%H559><s%> to them, "Take <S%H7760><s%> to your heart <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> I am warning <S%H5749><s%> you today, <S%H3117><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall command <S%H6680><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> to observe <S%H6213><s%> carefully, <S%H6213><s%> [even] all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> law. <S%H8451><s%>

"For it is not an idle <S%H7386><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> for you; indeed <S%H3588><s%> it is your life. <S%H9132><s%> And by this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> you shall prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you are about to cross <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess. <S%H3423><s%>"
And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> that very <S%H6106><s%> same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Go <S%H5927><s%> up to this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> opposite <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> and look <S%H7200><s%> at the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a possession. <S%H272><s%>

"Then die <S%H4191><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you ascend, <S%H5927><s%> and be gathered <S%H622><s%> to your people, <S%H9415><s%> as Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people, <S%H9415><s%>

because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> you broke <S%H4603><s%> faith <S%H4603><s%> with Me in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah-kadesh, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H834><s%> you did not treat <S%H6942><s%> Me as holy <S%H6942><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"For you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> at a distance, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5048><s%> but you shall not go <S%H935><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I am giving <S%H5414><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
